DarkMouse::

She kelt moving. With the maximal signal showing strongly on her 
scanner, she didn't want this bot to catch her. Yet at every turn, 
her scanner showed the maximal signature right at her location. Who 
ever this bot is they are really good at tracking, she thought.

She was now 5 miles away from Galvatron's ship.  Her wounds were now 
almost fully healed due to her energon mech fluid mix in her body.
She stopped and sat down.  She waited for a few minutes and then 
called out,"Hey you, who ever you are. I know your there. Just come 
out and we'll talk." She waited for a reply, but none came.

She sat back and relaxed against a large rock and waited. nothing 
happened. An hour passed and yet nothing happened. She called out a 
few more times but still had no responce. Things just didn't make 
sence to her. Why would a maximal be following her and not show 
themselves by now. Why would the auto defence systems to Galvatron's 
ship go off is there wasn't a maximal around to set them off? She 
pondered the question and her logic circuits couldn't come up with an 
answer.

She finally got back up and kept moving. Soon, it would be night fall 
and she'd have to make camp for the night. Maybe by then this strange 
maximal might show themselves.
